subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jaisalmer?
explanation_en:
Jaisalmer Fort, also known as Jaisalmer Vihar, is a famous fort located in Jaisalmer, Rajasthan.
English Explanation:
Jaisalmer Fort, also known as Jaisalmer Vihar, is a popular Fort situated in Jaisalmer, Rajasthan. It was built in the 12th century by Rao Jaisal, and it has a rich history and cultural significance in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: जयसालमर विधानसंघ, राजस्थान में जयसालमर विधानसंघ, जयसालमर विधानसंघ, राजस्थान में जयसालमर विधानसंघ के मैंने बने इन तथा राजस्थान में जयसालमर विधानसंघ
explanation_en: Jaisalmer Vihar was built by Rao Jaisal, who established the kingdom of Jaisalmer in Rajasthan. On the other hand, Jaisalmer Vihar is a part of the Jaisalmer Fort in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: जयसालमर विधानसंघ, राजस्थान में जयसालमर विधानसंघ, जयसालमर विधानसंघ
explanation_en: The Jaisalmer Vihar is a part of the Jaisalmer Fort, which was built by Rao Jaisal in the 12th century. The fort is located in the Jaisalmer district of Rajasthan and is known for its architectural beauty and historical significance.
